00154     if(!board[i].start_packet_seen) {
00155       if(diag) {
00156         printf("-- board 0x%02x waiting on start packet\n", i);

00174     if(num_packets < 0) {
00175       num_packets += 0x10000;
00176     }
00177 
00178     int num_missing = 0; 
00179     for(int j = num_packets; j >= 0; j--) {
00180       int pn = (board[i].start_packet + j) & 0xffff;
00181       if(board[i].packets[pn] == NULL) {
00182         if(diag) {
00183           num_missing++;
00184           missing = true;
00185         } else {
00186           return false; 
00187         }
00188       }
00189     }
00190     if(diag) {
00191       printf("-- board 0x%02x waiting on %d/%d packets\n", i, 
00192         num_missing, num_packets);
00193     }
00194   }
00195   return !missing;
00196 }
